org.example

Class DataStreamHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.DataStreamHandle

  • public class DataStreamHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    DataStreamHandle class is responsible for requesting data from the Alpha Vantage API, processing the data, calling the Median Selection class to obtain the relevant median, and then processing the data into the format required by JFreeChart.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataStreamHandle.Interval
      Time interval between two consecutive data points in the time series
      static class  DataStreamHandle.OutputSize
      The data size of API call

        interval - the time interval for the API call
